channel.title: AbstractPK
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i44.tinypic.com/nb4085.png[/img] [b]Story:[/b] [i]Well, although I've been a valid member of the forum for quite sometime now and I've never really started a private server, it was more or less for just messing around on. I suddenly got bored of doing the same thing over and over again. So I'm aiming to make [b]AbstractPK[/b] a unique server, one were 5000k will mean something.[/i]
[b]Combat[/b] [i]Combat will be started after Skilling finished.[/i]
[b]Skilling[/b] [img]http://s4.postimage.org/2l7yce3ac/Agility_icon.png[/img] - Fully gnome course - Fully agility-pyramid - Barbarian course - Wilderness Course - Realistic XP - Handy shortcuts through the game
[img]http://s4.postimage.org/2l9byii3o/Mining_icon.png[/img] - Mining guild - randomly gems - Mine everything
[img]http://s4.postimage.org/2l9f9l738/Woodcutting_icon.png[/img] - cut every tree - stomps - nests with rewards
[img]http://s4.postimage.org/2l95cd44k/Herblore_icon.png[/img] - Creating potions - Correct Supplies, spices and ingredients - Every potion
[b]Credits:[/b] [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=495285]RuneWings317[/url] || Jack from r/s [i]If you deserve credits, let me know and I will add you![/i]
[b]Media:[/b] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/nd31c6.png[/img] (This will be removed when more content gets added and newer images)
All of the information and such will be from: [url=http://runescape.wikia.com/wiki/Special:WikiActivity]RuneScape Wiki[/url] [i]Will update this more later, a bit busy at the moment.[/i] [/center]

item.title: AbstractPK
item.dc:creator: @_J_ava [J]ava
item.description:
@_J_ava wrote:

[center]
Story:
Well, although I’ve been a valid member of the forum for quite sometime now and I’ve never really started a private server, it was more or less for just messing around on. I suddenly got bored of doing the same thing over and over again. So I’m aiming to make AbstractPK a unique server, one were 5000k will mean something.

Combat
Combat will be started after Skilling finished.

Skilling

  • Fully gnome course
  • Fully agility-pyramid
  • Barbarian course
  • Wilderness Course
  • Realistic XP
  • Handy shortcuts through the game

  • Mining guild
  • randomly gems
  • Mine everything

  • cut every tree
  • stomps
  • nests with rewards

  • Creating potions
  • Correct Supplies, spices and ingredients
  • Every potion

Credits:
RuneWings317 || Jack from r/s
If you deserve credits, let me know and I will add you!

Media:

nd31c6.png774×556

(This will be removed when more content gets added and newer images)

All of the information and such will be from: RuneScape Wiki
Will update this more later, a bit busy at the moment.
[/center]

Read full topic
